title: Throhand Italic
content:
Does anyone have information on where I might get a free version of Throhand Italic or a copycat font? I need it for a very small job (freebie) and don’t want to shell out $40. Any help would be appreciated. TIA

Dave

 [‹ MicroType Type Ruler cap height percentage Question](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39910 "Go to previous forum topic") [If Evel Knievel came back as a font… ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221334/http:/www.typophile.com/node/39632 "Go to next forum topic")
author: badapple

comments.content: You’re not going to find a good free font in that genre, but [LTC Nicolas Cochin Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20080125221334/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/lanston_type/ltc_nicolas_cochin_italic/) gets you a similar flavor for $20.
